plot: 12,000 years have passed in this world, the story of Apollon and Sylvie have become a children's story called "Skies of Aquaria". The "Abductors" Invaders from Altea come to Earth with only one purpose: they invade to harvest humans. DEAVA the Aquaria Academy exists to train men and women to use Aquaria, but they cannot ever merge because of Guize stones, these block an "unholy union" between genders. The story follows Amata and Mikono in their enrollment into DEAVA, and fight the Abductors.
opening_theme: "Kimi no Shinwa—Aquarion Dai Ni Shō" (君の神話〜アクエリオン第二章) by AKINO with bless4
"Paradoxical Zoo" (パラドキシカルZOO) by AKINO with bless4
ending_theme: "Gekkō Symphonia" (月光シンフォニア; "Moonlight Symphonia") by AKINO & AIKI from bless4
"Yunoha no Mori" (ユノハノモリ) by Yui Ogura
"Aquaria Mau Sora" (アクエリア舞う空) by Tōkyō Shōnen Shōjo Gasshōtai (ep 24)
"Genesis of Aquarion" by AKINO featuring Bless4 (ep 26)
insert_song: "Eve no Danpen" (イヴの断片) by AKINO from Bless4 (eps 4,6,11,17)
"Kōya no Heath" (荒野のヒース) by AKINO (ep 13)
"Pride~Nageki no Tabi" (プライド~嘆きの旅) by AKINO (eps 10,18,24)
"Seitenshi Gakuen Kōka" (聖天使学園校歌) by Tōkyō Shōnen Shōjo Gasshōtai (eps 1,22)
"Shōten Shōka" (昇天唱歌) by Seitenshi Gakuen Danshibu Yūshi (ep 2)
"Sōsei no Aquarion" (創聖のアクエリオン) by AKINO (ep 16)
"ZERO" (ZERO ゼロ) by AKINO from Bless4 (ep 26)
